conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>Hello, foreigner. I'm a graduate student. I'm working on an efficient...</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>...way of making fuel cells from metal and purified protodermis.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>If you have 60 widgets and pure protodermis, I can do it for you.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Sorry, I don't have any purified protodermis.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Try the Great Temple. They have loads there.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Yes, please. Here's the protodermis and widgets.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Thanks for the opportunity. Here's your fuel cell.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
